channel.description: Recent content in Posts on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Blog 1 - Vote Share Margins of Congressional Elections
item.description: Hello! My name is June Park and I am a junior at the college studying Government on the data science track and this is the beginning of my blog for GOV 1347: Election Analytics. This week, I focused on visualization customization of congressional races. Map of Republican/Democrat vote-share margin by STATE (2016, 2018): The first set of maps (see above) represent the two-party vote share margin in the 2016 and 2018 congressional elections.
